thread.title: Really old master: Neanderthals were Europe's first painters

title: Really old master: Neanderthals were Europe's first painters
text:
Really old master: Neanderthals were Europe's first painters 3:51pm IST - 01:46 
The world's oldest known art has been identified as paintings in caves in Spain made by Neanderthals, not modern humans, suggesting our extinct cousins were far from being uncultured brutes. Stuart McDill reports.
